descriptions:
They drive away attackers by unleashing
psychic power. They can use telepathy
to talk with others.

Because their bodies are enveloped
in a special liquid, they can survive
in any environment.

in a special liquid, they are fine in any
environment, no matter how severe.

They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic
power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

It communicates with others telepathically.
Its body is encapsulated in liquid, but if it takes
a heavy blow, the liquid will leak out.

Many say that the special liquid covering this
Pokémon’s body would allow it to survive in
the vacuum of space.
name: Solosis
